summary: Senior Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience architecting and scaling backend and full-stack systems in finance, e-commerce, and public sectors. Expertise in modernizing legacy systems, optimizing SQL pipelines, and building high-performance, secure, and scalable enterprise applications. Proven track record reducing payroll processing by 7 days, cutting system failures by 40%, and accelerating reporting from 30 minutes to under 5. Skilled mentor and collaborative team leader.

highlights: Automated biometric attendance tracking with ZKTeco devices, accelerating payroll cycles by 7 days.
Consolidated two legacy banking plugins into a single .NET application, reducing system crashes by 40% and saving 20+ maintenance hours/month.
Developed real-time Telegram Bot notifications, improving incident response by 50% and maintaining 99% system uptime.
Redesigned SQL reporting pipelines, reducing query times from minutes to under 2 seconds.
Secured systems with authentication and CORS, eliminating 100% of unauthorized access attempts and passing IT audits.
Mentored 2 junior developers, reducing onboarding time by 30% and recurring support tickets by 15%.
Engineered Python REST APIs and custom Odoo ERP integrations, streamlining workflows with 99% user satisfaction.
Integrated Microsoft Teams with Odoo, increasing meeting adoption by 35% and saving 10+ hours/week of manual coordination.
Upgraded Odoo from v13 to v14, improving page load times by 20% and optimizing multiple module workflows.
Connected Odoo with ABA PayWay, enhancing transaction reliability by 30% for 1,000+ monthly payments.
Launched Khmer Care fundraising platform, raising $70.8K and partnering with 30+ organizations.
Optimized Firearms Metrics Platform, reducing reporting time from 30 minutes to under 5 minutes for 200+ law enforcement users.
Developed POS system with automated inventory and scale integration, eliminating 99% of manual entry errors.
Designed Hotel Management System with booking engine, reducing guest check-in time by 50% and increasing booking efficiency by 30%.
Delivered Clinic Management System with scheduling, notifications, and patient tracking, reducing wait times by 45%.
Configured Odoo ERP for e-commerce, enabling real-time order tracking and increasing customer retention by 15%.
